Name: Clairvoyant
Ingredients: 45 ml Lustau Oloroso Don Nuño Sherry
Instructions: STIR all ingredients with ice & fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: A hazelnut flavoured variation on the classic Coronation Cocktail
History: Created in 2008 by yours truly in Jerez, Spain and named after Claire Hu, a fellow drinks hack on the same trip who was a fan of hazelnut liqueur.
Nutrition: One serving of Clairvoyant contains 142 calories
